    • Constructor Detail

      • IntIndexQuery.Builder

        public IntIndexQuery.Builder(Namespace namespace,
                     String indexName,
                     Long start,
                     Long end)
        Construct a Builder for a IntIndexQuery with a range.

        Note that your index name should not include the Riak _int or _bin extension.

        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace in Riak to query.
        indexName - The name of the index in Riak.
        start - the start of the 2i range.
        end - the end of the 2i range.

      • IntIndexQuery.Builder

        public IntIndexQuery.Builder(Namespace namespace,
                     String indexName,
                     Long match)
        Construct a Builder for a IntIndexQuery with a single 2i key.

        Note that your index name should not include the Riak _int or _bin extension.

        Parameters:
        namespace - The namespace in Riak to query.
        indexName - The name of the index in Riak.
        match - the 2i key.
